def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def sailingBasePrice = parse.basePrices[0] log.info sailingBasePrice assert sailingBasePrice!=null
def sailingBasePriceId = parse.basePrices[0].sailingBasePriceId log.info sailingBasePriceId assert sailingBasePriceId!=null
